ComicInfo.Summary:
While Cyber meets with Tiger, Wolverine hallucinates courtesy of the compound coating his old enemy's claws.
Learning that the Arms of Salvation harvests organs from living victims, Firestar helps Freedom Force stop them.
Beast fends off the Constrictor who has been contracted to kill him. Hank then meets up with his old friend, Jennifer Nyles, who still doesn't remember him courtesy of a mindwipe by Professor X. The Super Apes show up and capture Jennifer.
